decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.itemTypes

Class ConsumablePlayerItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.itemBase.PlayerItem
      • decoworld.model.world.entities.inventory.itemTypes.ConsumablePlayerItem

  • public class ConsumablePlayerItem
extends PlayerItem
    Created by P3TE on 6/08/2014. An item that provides stats and has limited uses. This class extends the basic Item.
